name: serverless-nodejs-starter
description: A Node.js starter for the Serverless Framework with async/await and unit test support

scripts.mock:create: npx serverless invoke local --function create --path mocks/create-event.json
scripts.mock:get: npx serverless invoke local --function get --path mocks/get-event.json
scripts.mock:list: npx serverless invoke local --function list --path mocks/list-event.json
scripts.mock:update: npx serverless invoke local --function update --path mocks/update-event.json
scripts.mock:delete: npx serverless invoke local --function delete --path mocks/delete-event.json
scripts.mock:billing: npx serverless invoke local --function billing --path mocks/billing-event.json
